title: SpecMaskFoley: Steering Pretrained Spectral Masked Generative Transformer Toward Synchronized Video-to-audio Synthesis via ControlNet
author: Zhi Zhong (Sony Group Corporation), Akira Takahashi (Sony Group Corporation), Shuyang Cui (Sony Group Corporation), Keisuke Toyama (Sony Group Corporation), Shusuke Takahashi (Sony Group Corporation), Yuki Mitsufuji (Sony Group Corporation, Sony AI, USA), ...
relevance_why: The paper focuses on improving foley synthesis, a critical area in audio processing, which aligns closely with Dr. Liu's work on advanced audio generation techniques such as AudioLDM. The methods proposed could enhance text-to-audio systems by improving audio-video synchronization.
background: Foley synthesis aims to generate audio that is semantically and temporally aligned with video content, which enhances the overall synchronization between visual stimuli and audio feedback.
contribution: SpecMaskFoley introduces a framework that adapts the pretrained Spectral Masked Generative Transformer model for synchronized video-to-audio synthesis, achieving competitive performance against from-scratch models.

technical_comparison.prior_work: Previous methods focused on handcrafted temporal conditions or required extensive training from scratch, often resulting in poor synchronization.
technical_comparison.novelty: This work improves by leveraging pretrained models with a ControlNet approach and employs a Frequency-aware Temporal feature Aligner, simplifying the conditioning mechanism.

key_innovation: Utilizes a unique alignment strategy to adapt video features to a time-frequency audio representation without the complexity of traditional conditioning mechanisms.
real_world_impact: This method can significantly streamline the audio-visual content creation process in the creative industries, potentially reducing production time and improving synchronization quality.
limitations: The paper does not address how well the method generalizes to different genres of audio or video content.

new_terms.Foley synthesis: **Foley synthesis** refers to the reproduction of everyday sound effects that are added to films, videos, and other media in post-production to enhance audio quality.
new_terms.ControlNet: **ControlNet** is a method used to add conditional controls to pretrained generative models, often applied to improve coherence in generated content.
